name: QAnswer
author: The QA Company

sections.description:
QAnswer AI conversational assistant integrated in your website effortlessly.
Bring the power of AI to your website and improve your customer experience.
This plugin uses our own 3rd party service which is at https://app.qanswer.ai.
For more information, please read the [https://app.qanswer.ai/termsOfUse](Terms of Service) and the [https://app.qanswer.ai/termsOfUse#privacy](Privacy Policy).
sections.faq:
How do I setup my chatbot?

First you should have a QA system on https://app.qanswer.ai.
If you don\’t, you can create one. Do not forget to make it public, else you will not be able to put it on your website.
You can find the documentation at https://doc.qanswer.ai.
Then you just have to fill in your username and the name of your QA system in the settings of the plugin, in the admin dashboard in Settings > QAnswer.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Initial version.

1.0.1

  • Fixed a bug where the text copy button could not be used
  • Fixed a bug where text-to-speech could not be used
